actions.text: House Committee on Rules Reported an Original Measure. Report No: 99-715.
Called up by House as Privileged Matter.
Resolution Agreed to in House by Voice Vote.

official_title: A resolution providing for the consideration of the bill (H.R. 3042) to amend the Elementary and Secondary Education Act of 1965 to provide grants to local educational agencies for dropout prevention demonstration projects.

summary.text: Sets forth the rule for the consideration of H.R. 3042 (dropout prevention and reentry programs).

titles.title: A resolution providing for the consideration of the bill (H.R. 3042) to amend the Elementary and Secondary Education Act of 1965 to provide grants to local educational agencies for dropout prevention demonstration projects.
